strings.Value: "Groetus calls me… I feel his pale glow upon my face…"
"I grow closer to my god than ever… A moment more, and I shall see his image looking down upon the Boneyard!"
"Your time hasn't come yet, Harrim — don't hurry towards your end! You still have much to do here, among the living."
"Your faith is strange, dwarf. Strange and confusing to me."
"There now, let me help you this time. Groetus can wait."
"So why don't you rush to meet your master? If you love him so much, then what's stopping you?"
